txt.en:
'It is hard to find good help these days. I hired a man to kill a boar for me...and I even provided him the weapon to do so. So, what did he do when he found the boar? He was frightened, dropped the sword, and ran away.

'I no longer care about the boar. I simply want the sword back. It is an old family heirloom.

'I need someone trustworthy and brave to retrieve it for me. Will you do this?'
Téothic's sword may be found in the hills east of Aldburg.\n\nTéothic has asked you to recover his sword, an old family heirloom, which was dropped by the hunter that he hired.
Téothic is in Aldburg, to the west of the hills.\n\nYou found Téothic's heirloom sword and should return it to him at once.
Téothic hired a villager to kill a boar for him and gave the villager a family sword to do so. When the villager arrived at the location, he was overcome with dread, dropped the sword, and fled.
'You found my sword! I suppose there are some in this town who have a little skill, at the least.'
